person.persName: David R. Glass (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Alexander Glass and Elizabeth Glass. Married to Elizabeth M. Glass. father of M. J. Glass, W. T. Glass, and N. E. Glass. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.
